name: 20 YRS OF SHOGUN FT MONRROE, POLA & BRYSON, JAEVON, EMILIY MAKIS, DUSKEE
bio: The renowned UK drum and bass label celebrated by Moroe, Pola, Jaevon and Emily Makis.

name: 3 DAFT MONKEYS
bio: 3 Daft Monkeys are known for their eclectic mix of folk, world music, and punk. Their energetic style often blends traditional folk instruments with a modern twist.

name: 47SOUL
bio: Palestinian musical collective fusing hip hop, electronica and R&B into the sounds of Dabke and other Shaa’bi roots music from the Levantine region.

name: 4AM KRU
bio: 4AM Kru is a DJ duo known for their energetic sets that blend drum and bass with jungle influences. Their music often features rapid breakbeats and heavy basslines, making them a popular act in the rave and underground music scene.

name: A FOR ALPHA
bio: Electronic music luminary drawing inspiration from the 90s underground scene, blending reworked classics with contemporary productions.

name: A GUY CALLED GERALD
bio: A Guy Called Gerald is an influential figure in electronic music, particularly known for his contributions to house, techno, and drum and bass. His track 'Voodoo Ray' is iconic in the acid house movement.

name: A-FUTURE
bio: Freakenstein, intergalactic funk child, inspired by Underground Resistance. Delivers explosive techno and electro, igniting dancefloors with futuristic funk.

name: A.G.
bio: A.G. is known for his contributions to the hip-hop genre, particularly within the sub-genre of D.I.T.C. (Diggin' in the Crates Crew) which is a collective known for its influence on the underground hip-hop scene.

name: ADAM SHELTON
bio: Adam Shelton, Walsall-born, runs Below raves, One Records, Café Artum, and London’s Tantrum. Electro visionary launching Eon Records.

name: ADDISON GROOVE
bio: Addison Groove is the alias of Tony Williams, an electronic music producer known for his influential contributions to the footwork and juke scenes. He blends these styles with elements of dubstep and techno, creating a unique and danceable sound.

name: ADELPHI MUSIC FACTORY
bio: Adelphi Music Factory is known for their modern house music with a distinct, uplifting, and euphoric style that draws on classic house and rave influences.

name: ADMNTI B2B JACK LING
bio: ADMNTi has established himself as one of the tastemakers of his generation. FUSE and its offshoot INFUSE, Half Baked and Beeyou are some of the brands he has been known to frequent. Jack lings versatility and commitment to digging deep into the records of the past and keeping an ear to the ground.

name: AFLA
bio: Afla is recognized for his vibrant Afrobeat and highlife music. His innovative fusion of traditional African rhythms with contemporary sounds makes his music lively and engaging.

name: AFRIQUOI
bio: Live African dance music, fusing Congolese guitar and Gambian kora virtuosity with UK electronica to make dancefloor-friendly new music.

name: AFRODEUTSCHE
bio: AFRODEUTSCHE, Henrietta Smith-Rolla, Manchester-based DJ/producer. Blends Afrofuturistic electro, techno, classical, Detroit house. Drexciyan and Underground Resistance-inspired.

name: AHADADREAM
bio: Ahadadream is a London-based DJ and producer known for his contributions to the UK funky and bass scenes. He blends diverse influences to create vibrant, dancefloor-ready tracks.

name: AHADADREAM B2B NIKKI NAIR B2B RAJI RAGS
bio: Producer and DJ Nikki Nair’s hybridized dance music meets Ahadadream’s percussive gems and Rags’ hip hop sounds.

name: ALBERT LEE
bio: Well-travelled guitarist’s guitarist with a unique picking style performed at breakneck speeds that have to be seen to be believed.

name: ALEX MILLS
bio: Alex Mills is recognized in the House and Dance music scenes, known for her distinct soulful vocals that often enhance deep house and electronic dance tracks.

name: ALEX NUT
bio: Label catalyst bringing house, soul, boogie, funk, hip hop, broken beat, jazz and a variety of electronic sounds.

name: ALEXANDER NUT
bio: Alexander Nut is a renowned DJ and producer known for his eclectic style, blending elements of funk, soul, hip-hop, and electronic music. He is also the co-founder of Eglo Records, a label that has released music by artists such as Floating Points and Fatima.

name: ALEXIS TAYLOR
bio: Alexis Taylor is a member of the band Hot Chip and is known for his work in the electronic and indie pop genres. His music often features a combination of electronic beats, melodic synth lines, and thoughtful lyrics.

name: ALISHA B2B ARCHIE HAMILTON
bio: House sounds with some sultry deep rumbling low-end bass.

name: ALMASS BADAT B2B ARTHI
bio: International DJ, MC and broadcaster Almass Badat meets Arthi’s high-octane club sounds from dancehall to baile funk to garage, bassline and beyond.

name: ALOGTE OHO & HIS SOUNDS OF JOY
bio: Rarely has a band lived up to its name as well as this Ghanian collective, fusing sinuous Afrofunk with glorious vocal harmonies.

name: ALTERN 8
bio: Altern 8 is an English electronic music act from Stafford, best known for their early 1990s rave music, which combined elements of acid house, techno, and breakbeat hardcore.

name: ALUCIDNATION
bio: Scenic, panoramic soundscaping. Aural Architecture.

name: ALVVAYS
bio: Melody driven alternative rock with often “pathetic perspectives” on life and a hint of singer Molly Rankin’s Celtic roots.

name: AMALIAH B2B DANIELLE
bio: A wicked mix of rampant and rhythmic bass, techno and house from this duo who first teamed up at the tail end of last year.

name: AMELIE LENS
bio: Amelie Lens is a Belgian electronic music DJ, producer, and owner of the Lenske record label. She is best known for her dark, driving techno beats, which have made her a heavyweight in the international techno scene.

name: AN DANNSA DUB
bio: Six-piece live band fusing the mystical energy and instruments of traditional Scottish music and Gaelic song with the heavy driving basslines of digital dub.

name: ANA ROXANNE
bio: Embodying the radiance of R&B vocalists, the immaculateness of church hymns, and the soul-stirring power of devotional music, Ana Roxanne makes incredibly intimate pieces of music that combine meditative drone, calming ambient soundscapes, and angelic vocals.

name: ANDREW MAXWELL MORRIS
bio: Andrew Maxwell Morris is a singer-songwriter whose music fits within the genre of folk and acoustic rock. His songs often feature heartfelt lyrics, melodic guitar work, and a soulful vocal delivery.

name: ANDY BLAKE
bio: Andy Blake is a well-respected DJ and producer in the underground house and techno scenes, known for his deep knowledge of music and eclectic, vinyl-heavy DJ sets.

name: ANDY C
bio: Andy C is a legendary figure in the drum & bass genre, co-founder of the renowned Ram Records. Known for his rapid mixing skills and high-energy DJ sets, he has been an essential force in bringing drum & bass to a global audience.

name: ANDY CATO
bio: Andy Cato is best known as one half of the electronic music duo Groove Armada. His work primarily falls within the house, electronic, and chill-out genres, creating an eclectic mix of danceable and ambient tracks.

name: ANGEL D’LITE
bio: Angel D’Lite is an emerging artist in the electronic music scene, known for her vibrant and eclectic mixes. Her style often blends elements of house, trance, and breakbeat, creating a unique and energetic soundscape.

name: ANGIE MCMAHON
bio: Assured Australian singer songwriter with a bittersweet line in melancholy underpinning her storylines.

name: ANISH KUMAR
bio: Anish Kumar is an artist in the electronic and house music scene. His music often features vibrant beats and infectious grooves, making him a rising star in the dance music community.

name: ANNA PRIOR
bio: Anna Prior is the drummer of the electronic band Metronomy and is known for her contributions to the indie-pop and electronic music scenes.

name: ANNA WALL
bio: Anna Wall is a house and techno DJ, known for her deep and groovy sets and her contributions to the underground electronic music scene in the UK.

name: ANNA WALL B2B BOBBY.
bio: The new Fabric London resident back to back with Bobby kicking off this Fabric anniversary.

name: ANNE-MARIE
bio: The wonderfully self-deprecating R&B dance pop star and highlight of The Voice.

name: ANNIE MAC
bio: The internationally renowned DJ, author and host of Before Midnight events opens proceedings early, setting the right mood for the weekend.

name: ANOTR
bio: Blending, mixing, and compiling music into something you’ve never heard before while redefining house music.

name: ANTIKVARINIAI KASPIROVSKIO DANTYS
bio: Antikvariniai Kaspirovskio Dantys is a Lithuanian band known for their eclectic mix of Balkan, ska, and punk influences, creating lively and upbeat music.

name: ANTONY SZMIEREK
bio: Boasting a hip hop flow with his trademark, dynamic lyricism, an indie hip hop spoken wordsmith and champion of vocabulary.

name: APIENTO
bio: Test Pressing blogger and esoteric DJ.

name: ARCHIE HAMILTON
bio: Archie Hamilton is a prominent DJ and producer in the minimal house and techno scenes. He is known for his intricate production style, balancing deep, rolling basslines with crisp percussion and subtle melodies. Hamilton is also the founder of the Moscow Records label.

name: ARIELLE FREE
bio: Radio 1 DJ and Love Island Morning After host.

name: ARLO B2B LULAH FRANCS
bio: Arlo’s drum and bass colliding with Lulah’s electronic breaks.

name: ARLO PARKS
bio: Award-winning poetic storytelling with an emotional resonance that’s unflinchingly sincere and personal.

name: AROOJ AFTAB
bio: Gorgeous Urdu-infused dream pop with an intriguing mix of instruments from this Pakistani vocalist.

name: ARXX
bio: Alt rock gal pal duo playing pert pop songs with great hooks and a nod to alternative hip hop and rap. Great videos too.

name: ASHA PUTHLI
bio: The queen of cosmic disco makes a rare live appearance sparked by the success of a new album showcasing remixes of classic cuts like ‘Space Talk’ and ‘Right Down Here’.

name: AUGUST CHARLES
bio: Alt-Soul singer born in Ndola, Zambia influenced by Frank Ocean and Amy Winehouse.

name: AURORA
bio: Norwegian singer, songwriter, record producer and mood capturing radio DJ with a dramatic euphoric sound.

name: AURORA HALAL
bio: Producer, DJ and creator of The Mutual Dreaming Party with a hazy sensuality and a metallic dancefloor intensity.

name: AVRIL LAVIGNE
bio: Precursor of the pop punk wave of the early 2000s introducing a whole new generation to teenage angst and how to use it.

name: AXEL BOMAN
bio: Axel Boman is a Swedish DJ and producer known for his work in the house music genre. His music often incorporates deep, melodic house elements and has a distinctively quirky and playful edge.

name: AYRA STARR
bio: Afropop meets R&B through the dynamic vocal range of this soulful, sound-shifting singer songwriter.

name: AÆE B2B FONZO
bio: A mix of dark & soulful electronic music.

name: BABY QUEEN
bio: Pop hooks with punky aggression and sharp-edged cynicism creating alternative pop songs from this rising star.

name: BAGGY MONDAYS
bio: The legendary Manchester-flavoured indie-disco is back to kickstart another Glastonbury with a Thursday afternoon session. Get there early and bring your best singing voice!

name: BAKEY
bio: Bakey is a producer in the UK garage and bass music scene, known for his energetic beats and distinctive sound that draws from 2-step and grime influences.

name: BAKEY FT WHO KNEW
bio: With a distinctive fusion of sultry melodies, complex drum programming, and pounding beats.

name: BALMING TIGER
bio: Shunning the slickness of their more mainstream K-pop rivals this tumultuous indie hip hop collective deliver an eclectic and irresistible live set.

name: BANDYT
bio: The Bristol celebration of art, music and dacne takes over.

name: BAR ITALIA
bio: Mysterious trio whose intricate guitar patterns resonate behind Christante’s earnest revelations and edgy prose.

name: BAREFOOT BANDIT
bio: Barefoot Bandit is a British band that fuses reggae, rock, and dub to create a high-energy, feel-good sound. They are known for their engaging live performances and catchy, rhythm-driven music.

name: BARRY CAN'T SWIM
bio: A genre-splicing electronic soundscape skipping from Afrobeat to house to create an uplifting pocket symphony of sound.

name: BARRY CANT SWIM
bio: Barry Cant Swim is an electronic music producer, blending elements of house, jazz, and experimental sounds to create immersive, danceable tracks.

name: BASKERY
bio: Baskery is a Swedish band known for their unique blend of Americana, folk, and rock. The trio of sisters create a compelling sound that mixes raw, punk energy with traditional acoustic elements, often featuring banjos and double bass.

name: BATU
bio: Batu is a prominent figure in the contemporary UK bass and techno scenes. His work is known for its innovative rhythms and textures, and he is also the founder of the Timedance label.

name: BAXTER DURY
bio: Sardonic raconteur spinning spontaneous sad and funny yarns of everyday life, love and London.

name: BAZZOOKAS
bio: Bazzookas are a lively ska band from the Netherlands, known for their high-energy performances and catchy, brass-infused rhythms that draw from traditional ska and punk influences.

name: BC CAMPLIGHT
bio: Critically-acclaimed singer-songwriter with a heady mix of lustrous hooks and thematic moods bursting with sophisticated songs of fractured paranoia.

name: BEA BRENNAN
bio: Bea Brennan (Bleep43, Old Technology) presents her new quadraphonic, ambient sound work Thought Forms, with visual accompaniment provided by artist Damien Roach (555-5555)

name: BEANS ON TOAST
bio: Beans On Toast is a British folk singer-songwriter. Known for his raw, unfiltered lyrics and simple acoustic guitar arrangements, he often addresses political and social issues in a humorous and candid manner.

name: BEL COBAIN
bio: Multi-dimensional artist translating her message through jazz, house, alternative R&B and hip hop.

name: BEN HEMSLEY
bio: With alluring melodies and flavours of old school rave nostalgia, a hot ticket in UK house and techno.

name: BENGA
bio: Benga is a British musician, DJ, and music producer known as one of the pioneering forces in the dubstep genre. His innovative approach and collaborations have significantly influenced the sound and evolution of dubstep since its inception.

name: BENJI B
bio: Benji B is renowned for his eclectic DJ sets and radio shows, where he seamlessly blends hip-hop, grime, electronic, and soulful tunes. He has become a prominent figure in the underground music scene, known for his ability to discover and promote emerging talent.

name: BENNY L
bio: Randall-schooled DJ and producer turns up the bass.

name: BERNARD BUTLER
bio: Renowned songwriter and producer (Sam Lee, Jessie Buckley) who has worked with everyone from Bert Jansch to The Libertines and Tricky.

name: BETH NIELSEN CHAPMAN
bio: Beth Nielsen Chapman is a singer-songwriter whose work spans the genres of adult contemporary, pop, and country. Her music is often characterized by its heartfelt lyrics and emotive melodies.

name: BICEP
bio: Bicep is a Belfast-born electronic music duo known for their house and techno productions, often infused with elements of breakbeat, electro, and nostalgic rave culture.

name: BICEP PRES CHROMA
bio: Bicep, Belfast-born duo, acclaimed curators/producers. Known for dynamic electronic music and Chroma AV show. BBC:

name: BIG SPECIAL
bio: Featuring broad-shouldered poetry over ground-shaking live beats with anthemic blasts of melody and rousing riffage.

name: BILLIE MARTEN
bio: Minimalist acoustic folk inspired by the likes of Nick Drake, Joan Armatrading, and Kate Bush, now bolstered with a backbone of bass and rhythm.

name: BILLY BRAGG
bio: Your host, celebrating a remarkable 40 years as Britain’s favourite singer, songwriter and campaigner.

name: BILLY NOMATES
bio: A beacon of brutal truth in an industry built on inconsequential bullshit with songs that roll out like real time experiences.

name: BLACK PUMAS
bio: Guitarist Adrian Quesada and vocalist Eric Burton have created an incendiary live show drawn from the psychedelic soul of their two Grammy-nominated albums.

name: BLACKBERRY WOOD
bio: Blackberry Wood is known for their unique blend of acoustic, gypsy, and folk-punk music. Their energetic performances often feature eclectic instrumentation, creating a festive and vibrant atmosphere.

name: BLANCO
bio: Breaking ground as a drill pioneer turned genre-bending rap innovator.

name: BLAWAN
bio: Blawan, aka Jamie Roberts, Barnsley native, ex-drummer turned techno innovator. Known for experimental techno, Kilner/Bored Young Adults aliases, and TERNESC label.

name: BLOC PARTY
bio: Kele Okereke and Russell Lissack’s revived post punk indie rock favourites return with a host of riff-heavy hits.

name: BLONDSHELL
bio: American alt rock with booming drums and plenty of Goth rock drama before every glorious chorus redeems it all.

name: BOB VYLAN
bio: A powerhouse of rhythm and vitriol embracing chaos and peace with rap and riffs creating genre-defying, fist-waving social commentary.

name: BOBBY FRICTION
bio: Bobby Friction is a British DJ and television presenter noted for his work in the UK Asian music scene. He specializes in genres like Bhangra, Asian Underground, and electronic dance music, often highlighting South Asian influences.

name: BOMBAY BICYCLE CLUB
bio: Guitar-fronted genre-switching indie rock with a nod to everything from old school folk to future electronica.

name: BONOBO
bio: Musician, producer, and DJ who debuted with a trip hop aesthetic and has since explored more upbeat tempo as well as jazz and world music

name: BOOTY BASS
bio: The Bristol collective of  female/nb/queer DJS.

name: BOU
bio: Bou is a well-known producer in the drum and bass scene, particularly in the jump-up and roller sub-genres. His tracks are celebrated for their dynamic basslines and infectious rhythms.

name: BRADLEY ZERO
bio: Rhythm Section founder and Boiler Room original with his infectious love of new music.

name: BREAK
bio: Break is a British drum and bass producer and DJ. Known for his technical skills and deep, rolling basslines, he has released numerous tracks and albums that are staples in the DnB community.

name: BRITTANY HOWARD
bio: While the Nashville-based artist originally made her name with Alabama Shakes, its her two subsequent solo albums that have really revealed her colossal creative spirit.

name: BRYTE
bio: Bryte is a Ghanaian artist known for his high-energy Afrobeat and dancehall music. He often blends traditional Ghanaian sounds with modern electronic elements.

name: BUFFOS WAKE
bio: Buffos Wake are known for their wild and eclectic blend of folk-punk and gypsy influences. Their energetic performances and unique sound make them stand out in the world of alternative folk music.

name: BURNA BOY
bio: Politically-active Nigerian singer songwriter whose blend of easy going Afro-pop, rap and R&B has reaped a host of Grammy Awards and global recognition.

name: BURT COPE
bio: Burt Cope is known for his work in the UK Bass genre, a subgenre of electronic dance music characterized by heavy basslines and often incorporates elements of Garage and Grime.

name: CAITY BASER
bio: Charismatic singer songwriter mixing her inner Etta james with an understanding of classic pop melodies.

name: CALEB KUNLE
bio: Soul music in its purest form for the modern era.

name: CALUM BOWIE
bio: Singer songwriter single-handedly redefining the Scottish music scene with his dynamic live performances.

name: CAM COLE
bio: Cam Cole is a musical artist known for his gritty, raw sound that blends rock, blues, and folk influences. His one-man-band performances showcase his talents on guitar, drums, and vocals, creating a unique and powerful live experience.

name: CAMELPHAT
bio: Arena-filling DJ duo from Liverpool redefining the electronic and dance mediums with their hi-octane sets.

name: CAMILA CABELLO
bio: Perfect slipstream electronic pop filled with Latin R&B flavours from the effervescent Cuban soprano.

name: CARA HAMMOND
bio: Cara Hammond is a singer-songwriter whose music blends soulful pop with influences from folk and jazz. Known for her compelling vocal delivery and introspective songwriting, Hammond creates music that is both emotive and relatable.

name: CARASEL
bio: Carasel is known in the drum and bass scene, often recognized for his skills as an MC and vocalist. He has collaborated with various producers and is a staple in live drum and bass events.

name: CARISTA
bio: Carista, Utrecht DJ/producer, captivates with genre-blending sets. BBC Radio 1 resident, acclaimed Essential Mix. Red Light Radio alum.

name: CARLITA
bio: Mixing live and electronic instruments, sampled instruments and field recordings from her travels.

name: CARLY WILFORD
bio: After a series of standout releases in 2024, Carly Wilford has secured her space as one of the most promising new names in dance music. With her tunes heavily backed by Radio 1, she has recently shared stages with likes of Hannah Laing, Arielle Free, Monki and Meg Ward.

name: CASEY SPILLMAN
bio: Casey Spillman is a rising artist in the UK house and techno scene. His music often features deep, rolling basslines and intricate rhythms, catering to both underground clubs and larger electronic music festivals.

name: CASEY SPILLMAN B2B JULIAN ANTHONY
bio: Casey Spillman perfectly recreates a combination of sounds his city is known for, with his reputation in London spread to an international level in recent years. Julian Anthony was raised in the Amsterdam underground house scene, surrounded by Slapfunk founders and vinyl heads.

name: CASISDEAD
bio: Hailed as one of the best things to happen in British rap and renowned for his incisive inventive lyrics.

name: CASSETTEBOY
bio: Cassetteboy is a British musical duo known for their humorous mashups and mixes, often using samples from television, film, and music to create satirical pieces.

name: CC:DISCO
bio: Slow, pumping playful and uplifting electronic sounds from the Australian DJ.

name: CC:DISCO!
bio: Cc:Disco! is a DJ and radio host celebrated in the electronic and dance music scene. Her sets often feature a nostalgic mix of disco, house, and boogie, creating vibrant and feel-good dance floor experiences.

name: CELEBRATING ANNIE
bio: A late night session devoted to the Festival regular and Radio 1 stalwartr.

name: CHAOS IN THE CBD
bio: The iconic duo of brothers Ben and Louis and their journey from the beaches of New Zealand to the bustling dance community of Peckham, London, has seen them rise as one of the hottest acts in the house music scene.

name: CHARISSE C
bio: Charisse C, DJ/artist, founder of Abantu. Blends Zimbabwean, South African roots with UK sounds. Known for soulful, bass-heavy sets.

name: CHARLI XCX
bio: Charli XCX is an influential figure in the Hyperpop genre, known for its exaggerated, eclectic pop sound that incorporates elements of electronic, avant-garde, and mainstream pop music.

name: CHARLI XCX PRESENTS PARTYGIRL
bio: Offering a close-up look at Charli’s glitchy, club music era.

name: CHARLIE TEE B2B SOTA
bio: Charlie Tee’s celebration of electronic music meets Sota’s drum and bass sounds.

name: CHARLOTTE PLANK
bio: Singer, songwriter and producer with a string of her own poppy drum and bass anthems.

name: CHEZ DE MILO B2B ELLIE STOKES
bio: Love International's Chez & Ellie make all manner of wave-related sonics eruptions.

name: CHIEDU ORAKA
bio: A conscious grime artist who moves with purpose.

name: CHIMINYO
bio: Chiminyo is a groundbreaking artist known for his unique blend of electronic music with live percussion. He uses custom-designed drum kits to create intricate and dynamic performances, seamlessly integrating electronic beats and samples.

name: CHIMPO
bio: Chimpo is a Manchester-based producer and DJ known for his work in the Drum and Bass and Grime scenes. His unique style often blends elements from both genres, making his tracks energetic and bass-heavy.

name: CHLOE SLATER
bio: Playing peppy indie rock and some spikey guitar for added texture.

name: CHLOE SLOMO A/V
bio: SloMo A/V, Chloé's ambient project, is an experience that could be described as immersive. Here, sounds generate images, or perhaps it's the other way around: hard to tell in this enigmatic, hypnotic dialogue.

name: CHRIS CRUSE
bio: Chris Cruse is a DJ who is deeply rooted in the LGBTQ+ underground scene. He is the founder of the critically acclaimed queer party series Spotlight, known for its cutting-edge house and techno selections. Cruse’s sets are known for their emotional depth and dancefloor intensity.

name: CHRIS DIFFORD
bio: Chris Difford is known for being a member of the British rock band Squeeze. His primary sub-genre is new wave, a style that emerged in the late 1970s and incorporates elements of pop, punk, and electronic music.

name: CHRIS STUSSY
bio: DJ, producer and label boss established as a central figure within the modern house landscape.

name: CHUNKY
bio: Celebrating Floating Points and Alex Nut’s Eglo label with stalwart Manchester rapper and producer Chunky.

name: CLIPZ
bio: Straight from Bristol’s rave scene of the 90s on a drum and bass/jungle tip.

name: COAST 2 COAST
bio: Berlin’s first mobile record shop turned three person B2B DJ experience exploring infinite possibilities.

name: COCO EM
bio: Coco Em is a Nairobi-based DJ and producer known for her eclectic mixes that blend elements of house, afrobeat, and electronic music. She is celebrated for her ability to incorporate diverse musical influences into her sets.

name: COLDPLAY
bio: The Music Of The Spheres carbon-reduced world tour touches down at the Pyramid for a Saturday night spectacular.

name: CONDUCTA
bio: Conducta is a DJ and producer from the UK who is a leading figure in the UK garage revival movement. He is known for his smooth, melodic tracks that bring a modern twist to the classic garage sound.

name: CONFIDENCE MAN
bio: Highly polished Antipodean electropop duo who are unstoppable, unquenchable, fierce, flirty and full of big tunes.

name: CORINNE BAILEY RAE
bio: Released last year, ‘Black Rainbows’ was the sound of an artist cutting loose and diving deep into the collective black culture.

name: COSMO SHELDRAKE
bio: Cosmo Sheldrake is a British musician, composer, and producer known for his eclectic and experimental approach to music. His work often incorporates elements of folk, electronic, and various world music traditions, creating a unique and whimsical soundscape.

name: COUSIN KULA
bio: Bristol band bringing a dreamy, laid-back sound to the soul underground scene.

name: CRAIG CHARLES
bio: Craig Charles is a multifaceted artist known for his work as a DJ and presenter. He is particularly celebrated for his contributions to the funk and soul genres, often hosting shows that feature classic tracks and contemporary hits in these styles.

name: CRAIG RICHARDS
bio: Artist, record collector, dreamer, DJ, producer, and artist in residence and musical director at Fabric for 25 years takes control.

name: CRAIG RICHARDS B2B FRANCESCO DEL GARDA
bio: Artist, record collector, dreamer, DJ, producer, and artist in residence and musical director at Fabric for 25 years takes control.

name: CRAZY P
bio: Slinky underground disco, deep electronic throbs and shimmering pop melodies; dance music with heart and soul.

name: CUT CAPERS
bio: Explosive nine-piece with a killer live reputation filled with booming brass hooks and epic high energy arrangements.

name: CYNDI LAUPER
bio: Activist, actress and 80s global pop icon whose ‘Girls Just Want To Have Fun’ remains the legendary feminist anthem.

name: D-BLOCK EUROPE
bio: British hip hop collective delivering woozy trap and some hedonistic rap rhymes.

name: D:REAM
bio: Chart toppers celebrating 30 years anniversary with a brand-new show full of their anthems.

name: DAISY CHAPMAN
bio: Daisy Chapman's music sits at the intersection of dark folk and chamber pop. Known for her haunting piano compositions and powerful vocals, she crafts emotionally charged songs that resonate deeply with her audience.

name: DAN BEAN
bio: Wonky horizontal psychedelia

name: DAN SHAKE
bio: The groove lover, ranging from sparky acid to Brazilian samba, itchy funk to heavyweight house.

name: DAN SHAKE B2B LOVEFOXY
bio: The groove lover meets the energetic Berliner’s punchy sounds.

name: DANIEL AVERY
bio: A dexterous DJ who has turned his hand to everything from pounding techno to dark industrial noise and blissed out ambience over the years.

name: DANNY BROWN
bio: Having dropped his sixth studio album, ‘Quaranta’ last year, the Detroit-raised MC is making an overdue debut at the festival.

name: DAPHNI
bio: Daphni is a side project of Canadian musician Dan Snaith, who is also known for his work as Caribou. Under the Daphni moniker, Snaith delves into electronic dance music, creating tracks that are innovative and often geared towards the dance floor with a mix of house, techno, and experimental sounds.

name: DAR DISKU
bio: Dar Disku is a duo known for their eclectic DJ sets and music productions that draw heavily from Middle Eastern and Arabic influences. They often blend traditional sounds with contemporary electronic music, creating unique and danceable tracks.

name: DAR DISKU B2B NABIHAH IQBAL
bio: The musician, writer and broadcaster meets the label championing the sounds of the Middle East, Asia and beyond.

name: DAS BRASS
bio: Das Brass is a dynamic brass band that infuses traditional brass band music with elements of funk, hip-hop, and dance. Their high-energy performances are known for their infectious grooves and lively atmosphere.

name: DAVE HARVEY B2B FELIX DICKINSON
bio: Teamlove supremo Dave Harvey meets Glastonbury favourite Felix Dickinson.

name: DAVID CELIA
bio: David Celia is a Canadian singer-songwriter known for his engaging blend of folk rock and pop. His music often features harmonious melodies, thoughtful lyrics, and a warm, acoustic-driven sound.

name: DAVID R ABRAM - PREHISTORIC BRITAIN FROM THE AIR
bio: Join photographer and author David R Abram on a revelatory aerial journey across the ceremonial landscapes of prehistoric Britain.

name: DEAF RAVE

bio: DJ Skitz is a key figure in the UK hip-hop scene, known for his production work and DJing. His music often features socially conscious lyrics and a blend of hip-hop beats with elements of reggae and funk.

name: SKREAM
bio: Skream is a British electronic music producer and DJ, often credited as a pioneer in the dubstep genre. He has been influential in shaping the sound of dubstep with his minimalist yet impactful productions, and has also explored house and techno in his later work.

name: SKREAM & BENGA
bio: Dubstep legends Skream And Benga reunited with SGT Pokes.

name: SLEAFORD MODS
bio: With their trademark minimal electronics, incisive often surreal wordplay, the dynamic duo disassemble the wrongs of world with righteous anger.

name: SMOKIN' JO
bio: Smokin' Jo is a renowned DJ in the house and techno scene. With a career spanning several decades, she has played at some of the world's most famous clubs and festivals and has made significant contributions to the dance music landscape.

name: SOCCER MOMMY
bio: Insular thought provoking snapshots of elation and its after effects from the alternative indie singer songwriter.

name: SOFIA KOURTESIS
bio: The exuberance of the Peruvian producer’s live performance reflect the tropical vibrancy of the tunes culled from her much loved album, ‘Madras’.

name: SOFT PLAY
bio: Topless tattooed punk rock with suitably abrasive hardcore edges from the band formerly known as Slaves.

name: SONIQUE
bio: Former S'Express vocalist turned DJ.

name: SONNY FODERA
bio: Australian-born DJ and producer who has created his own brand of groove driven and emotive house music.

name: SOPHIE ELLIS BEXTOR
bio: Sophie Ellis Bextor is a British singer-songwriter known for her work in the pop and disco genres, gaining fame with hits like 'Murder on the Dancefloor' and 'Groovejet (If This Ain't Love)'.

name: SOPHIE FAITH
bio: Sophie Faith is a singer-songwriter whose music blends elements of soul, jazz, and R&B. Her emotive voice and heartfelt lyrics have garnered her a dedicated following and critical acclaim in the contemporary soul scene.

name: SPRINTS
bio: Brash Irish four-piece transforming pain into truth, passion into purpose and perseverance into strength with a punky edge and some polished melodies.

name: SQUEEZE
bio: The new wave institution celebrating 50 years of waxing lyrical about the lovelorn British condition.

name: SQUID
bio: Joyfully unclassifiable, Squid’s music is all about control and release. Tightly coiled rhythms twist until they explode, the scattered shards reassembling into something else entirely.

name: ST PAULS CARNIVAL B2B NOTTING HILL CARNIVAL
bio: A Carnival soundclash as St pauls meets Notting Hill.

name: STEEL PULSE
bio: Heavyweight roots rockers whose latest release, ‘Mass Manipulation’, drips with the same righteous indignation that fired such classics as ‘Handsworth Revolution’.

name: STEVE DAVIS & KAVUS TORABI AMBIENT DJ SET
bio: Steve Davis & Kavus Torabi, Expect an inspiring genre-spanning DJ set from the duo - a set impossible to narrow down but effectively across the board - weird and left field Prog Bangers with Quality Electronic and top end Techno slung into the mix!

name: STEVE HILLAGE & MIQUETTE GIRAUDY PERFORMING RAINBOW DOME MUSICK
bio: Steve Hillage and Miquette Giraudy perform their groundbreaking and seminal no-beats ambient work Rainbow Dome Musick on the new Woodsies Tree stage with its surround sound system. Not to be missed!

name: STEVE KNIGHTLEY
bio: Steve Knightley is best known as a folk music artist. He is a prolific singer-songwriter and a key member of the folk duo Show of Hands, known for their powerful, resonant, and socially conscious music.

name: STEVEN WILSON THE HARMONY CODEX TITLE TRACK IN QUADRAPHONIC
bio: Steven Wilson is a multi-Grammy nominated musician, solo artist and producer, as well as being the founding member of British rock band Porcupine Tree.

name: STONE JETS
bio: Stone Jets are a South African duo known for their folk-pop sound, which combines catchy melodies with vibrant rhythms and insightful lyrics, reflecting their diverse musical influences.

name: STORNOWAY
bio: Atmospheric indie folk meets chamber pop from this revitalised and re-invigorated nature-celebrating band.

name: SUBB-AN
bio: Subb-An is a notable name in the contemporary house and techno scenes, recognized for his sophisticated production techniques and consistently innovative releases that push the boundaries of electronic music.

name: SUBMOTIVE
bio: More 'Headz space with the renowned DJ and producer.

name: SUGABABES
bio: The Sugababes are known for their eclectic mix of Pop, R&B, and dance music, characterized by harmonious vocals and innovative production.

name: SUGAR FREE B2B FONTE
bio: The duo serve up vibrant house, techno and electro.

name: SUNTOU SUSSO
bio: Suntou Susso is a Gambian musician renowned for his modern take on traditional West African music. He specializes in the kora, a 21-string lute-bridge-harp, blending it with contemporary sounds.

name: SYREETA
bio: London-based selector whose sounds are as diverse as her approach to life

name: SZA
bio: Multi-award-winning songwriter (Beyonce, Rhianna) whose much-anticipated new album ‘Lana’ is set to catapult her to further heights.

name: T.JACQUES
bio: Originating from the outskirts of the M25 Circular, London-based T. Jacques is carving out a name for himself in the underground house landscape, gaining recognition through a series of recent EP’s on labels such as Butter Side Up, MINDHELMET and his own Nuances de Nuit imprint.

name: TAMA SUMO
bio: Tama Sumo is a respected DJ and producer within the house and techno genres. Associated with Berlin's legendary Berghain & Panorama Bar, she is known for her eclectic and deep musical selections.

name: TANITA TIKARAM
bio: Renowned folky singer songwriter and a passionate political commentator and campaigner, deeply committed to human rights and justice for all.

name: TARA LILY
bio: Tara Lily is a breakthrough artist in the jazz and R&B scenes. Hailing from London, her music seamlessly blends contemporary jazz with soulful melodies, infused with hints of her Bangladeshi heritage and modern production techniques.

name: TASH LC
bio: Tash Lc is a London-based DJ and radio presenter recognized for her eclectic mixes that span across genres like Afrobeat, highlife, and electronic music. Her work often highlights the rich sounds of the African diaspora.

name: TAYLAH ELAINE
bio: Genre surfing selector, fusing new tracks, old classics and everything in between and from every genre.

name: TEMS
bio: GRAMMY Award-winning, Oscar nominated, Nigerian singer songwriter and producer of exotically rhythmic R&B, soul and Afropop.

name: TENNYSON KING
bio: Tennyson King is known for his soulful and electrifying blend of rock and folk music. His style often incorporates elements of blues and roots, delivering a raw, gritty sound that is both captivating and reflective.

name: THE AYOUB SISTERS
bio: Classical chart toppers recognised for their ability to unite different genres and cultures through their unique style.

name: THE BAR-STEWARD SONS OF VAL DOONICAN
bio: Folky cult collective of knit-wear enthusiasts with a penchant for Bar-Stewardizing famous songs with satirical comedy lyrics.

name: THE BAREFOOT BANDIT
bio: The Barefoot Bandit is a reggae/dub band known for their energetic performances and fusion of reggae with elements of rock and ska, creating a lively and upbeat sound.

name: THE BOOKSHOP BAND
bio: The Bookshop Band creates folk-inspired music, often drawing on literature and storytelling in their lyrics. They are known for performing in bookstores and literary festivals.

name: THE BOOTLEG BEATLES
bio: From period piece Merseybeat to Pepper-era psychedelia with all of the between-song Lennon one-liners adding to the authenticity.

name: THE BREEDERS
bio: Demonstrating their versatility and panache on their reformation, seamlessly transitioning from dreamy, melancholic melodies to grungy, frenetic alt-pop.

name: THE BURMA
bio: Glowing dance-orientated indie rock ‘n’ roll from Ireland with plenty of punky attitude.

name: THE CARRY NATION
bio: The Carry Nation is a DJ and production duo known for their work in the underground house and techno scenes. Their eclectic sets and productions often feature a mixture of deep house rhythms and vibrant techno beats.

name: THE CAT EMPIRE
bio: Big selling, award-winning Australian outfit blessed overflowing with emotion, madness, and a deep sense of celebration on their many crowd-pleasing favourites.

name: THE DEEP BLUE
bio: Rebellious but beautiful stories fusing anthemic themes and small musings with hypnotic harmonies.

name: THE DOWNSETTERS
bio: The Downsetters are a ska band known for their energetic and vibrant performances. Their sound incorporates elements of traditional ska, punk, and reggae, making them a dynamic presence in the modern ska revival scene.

name: THE EGG
bio: The Egg is known for their dance-oriented sound that blends elements of electronic, rock, and funk. They gained significant attention with their track 'Walking Away,' which received various remixes, blending catchy grooves with live instrumentation.

name: THE EGG AMBIENT SET
bio: The Egg - Twins Ned and Maff Scott (& more) play live electronic dance /chill / rocktronic / vocoder with a visual triggered show & more, Think Pink Floyd, Underworld , Air, Daft Punk

name: THE FARM
bio: Legendary post-new wavers recently adopting electronic sounds that are brought to life with dynamic guitar riffs.

name: THE FEELING
bio: Multi-million selling indie pop with a slew of chart-topping classics sitting neatly with brand new album ‘San Vito’.

name: THE FILTHY SIX
bio: The Filthy Six are known for their work in the modern jazz and soul-jazz scene, often blending elements of classic 60s soul and funk with contemporary jazz influences.

name: THE GO! TEAM
bio: A kaleidoscopic mix of rock and funk, aided by the power of the bassline and vocals from stalwart Ninja on a groovy sonic day trip.

name: THE JONNY HALIFAX INVOCATION
bio: The Jonny Halifax Invocation is known for their raw, electric blues sound, blending elements of psychedelia, rock, and drone music.

name: THE JUNGLE DRUMMER
bio: The Jungle Drummer, known for his dynamic live performances, is a virtuoso drummer who merges live drumming with jungle and drum & bass music. His energetic and precise drumming style has earned him a unique place in the electronic music world.

name: THE KS
bio: Gloriously northern angsty indie pop from a band renowned for their raucous and uplifting live shows.

name: THE LAST DINNER PARTY
bio: The BBC Sounds of 2024 winners unwrapping their literate indie art rock and dramatic baroque pop.

name: THE MAGIC NUMBERS
bio: Million selling, Mercury Prize nominated four-piece known for their gorgeous harmonies, melodic hooks and timeless sound.

name: THE MANFREDS
bio: The Manfreds are a British R&B band, known for their association with the 1960s pop scene. Their music often features a blend of blues, jazz, and pop influences, with catchy melodies and soulful sounds that have stood the test of time.

name:
THE MANFREDS
FEATURING PAUL JONES & MIKE D’ABO
bio: Celebrating a remarkable 60 years as one of Britain’s most respected bands; a rare opportunity to see both vocalists Paul Jones and Mike D’Abo on stage together.

name: THE MARY WALLOPERS
bio: A joyous vision of the historic music of their Irish homeland delivered in proper rabble-rousing style.

name: THE NATIONAL
bio: Dark, melancholy and difficult to describe; filled with bittersweet melodies and euphoric conspiratorial storylines.

name: THE NEXTMEN
bio: The Nextmen are a production and DJ duo known for their eclectic mix of hip-hop, reggae, and electronic music. Their versatile style has earned them a prominent place in the UK music scene, with various successful albums and live performances.

name: THE NEXTMEN FT KIKO BUN
bio: North London’s sound system governor Kiko Bun, with The Nextmen providing rgan groove streaked with a folky, 60s touch of psychedelia.

name: THE OLD TIME RAGS
bio: The Old Time Rags is a group that specializes in performing traditional ragtime music. Their engaging live shows often feature a combination of lively music and vintage costumes, capturing the spirit and energy of the early 20th century.

name: THE ORB
bio: Orb’s interstellar space odysse

name: THE PARALLELS
bio: Mid-tempo but hugely uplifting guitar-led pop.

name: THE PLUMPS
bio: The Plumps, consisting of DJ duo Lee Rous and Andy Gardner, are pioneers in the breaks sub-genre of electronic music known as 'Plump DJs'. They have significantly contributed to the breakbeat and nu-skool breaks scenes since the late 1990s.

name: THE PRIMITIVES
bio: The Primitives are a British indie pop band that rose to fame in the late 1980s. Their sound is characterized by catchy melodies, jangly guitars, and the distinctive voice of lead singer Tracy Tracy. They are best known for their hit 'Crash'.

name: THE SCRATCH
bio: A full-blown metal band turned to acoustic busking losing none of their raw energy in the process.

name: THE SCRIBES
bio: The Scribes are a hip-hop group known for their socially conscious lyrics and dynamic live performances. Their music blends elements of traditional hip-hop with contemporary sounds and thought-provoking themes.

name: THE SILHOUETTES PROJECT
bio: Best of the new platform for up and coming Hip-Hop, Soul and Jazz artists from the UK.

name: THE SKATALITES
bio: The original pioneers of ska and rocksteady have a history stretching back 60 years. Featuring some legendary musicians, the band prove why this music will never die.

name: THE SNUTS
bio: Fist-bumping good time singalong Scottish indie rock; anthems made to measure.

name: THE STAVES
bio: Dreamy alternative indie folk duo who sparkle and glow via sisters Jessica and Camilla Staveley-Taylor’s joyous harmonies.

name: THE STREETS
bio: Mike Skinner’s streetwise inner-city storylines switching from broken dreams to broken reality, soundtracked with a suitably subdued electronic vibe.

name: THE TROUBLE NOTES
bio: The Trouble Notes are celebrated for their world fusion music, combining classical violin techniques with folk, gypsy jazz, and electronic beats. Their music often transcends cultural boundaries and invites listeners into a diverse sonic landscape.

name: THE VACCINES
bio: Champions of the melody hook and big chorus return with more boisterous anthems from new album ‘Pick-Up Full Of Pink Carnations’.

name: THE ZAWOSE QUEENS
bio: The Zawose Queens are known for their traditional Tanzanian music, incorporating indigenous instruments and vocal styles that showcase the rich musical heritage of East Africa.

name: THE ZUTONS
bio: Back to their happy clapping playful best playing uplifting, rueful and expertly crafted tunes after their brief hiatus.

name: THEO KOTTIS
bio: Theo Kottis is a Scottish DJ and producer whose music typically falls within the realm of house and techno. His style frequently features melodic and emotive elements, creating a deep and immersive listening experience.

name: THINK TONK
bio: A celebration of drum and bass, jungle and dancehall, an adventure into all things Bashy, Bassy, Wavey and Ravey.

name: THIS IS THE KIT
bio: Banjo-toting singer songwriter with a hypnotic twang pattern and a voice of rare, unaffected beauty.

name: THRILL COLLINS
bio: Thrill Collins is a British acoustic trio known for their high-energy live performances and unique covers of popular songs. They describe their style as 'skiffle pop,' blending skiffle—a genre influenced by jazz, blues, and folk—with pop music elements.

name: TIANNA
bio: Bristol born, neo-soul singer songwriter, influenced by the likes of Joy Crookes, Pip Millet and Greentea Peng.

name: TIM REAPER
bio: Future Retro London label boss and lover of all things Jungle, Drum & Bass and Hardcore.

name: TOBY LEE
bio: Self-taught guitar slinger who oozes class and boasts a musical resume to die for; from the West End to sharing the stage with Slash and Joe Bonamassa.

name: TODD EDWARDS
bio: Todd Edwards is an American house and garage producer known for his pioneering work in the UK garage scene. He is famous for his unique vocal sampling technique, which has influenced a generation of electronic music producers.

name: TOMMY HOLOHAN
bio: Tommy Holohan is an Irish DJ and producer known for his high-octane techno tracks, blending industrial and rave elements to create a hard-hitting sonic experience.

name: TONINO BALIARDO
bio: Tonino Baliardo is a founding member and lead guitarist of the Gipsy Kings, instrumental in defining their distinctive sound that mixes traditional flamenco with contemporary influences.

name: TORS
bio: Making the kind of songs you shout along to in the car alone with the windows down, just before last call in a pub full of friends.

name: TOVE LO
bio: Tove Lo is a Swedish singer and songwriter known for her raw, confessional pop music. Her style often incorporates elements of electropop and indie pop, characterized by catchy hooks and emotionally charged lyrics.

name: TOYA DELAZY
bio: Toya Delazy is a South African artist known for her unique blend of jazz, electro, and hip-hop, a style she refers to as 'JEHP'.

name: TOYAH
bio: Toyah Willcox is a British musician known for her work in the new wave and punk rock genres. Active since the late 1970s, she has been a dynamic performer and has also ventured into acting.

name: TOYAH & ROBERT
bio: Punk and new wave hit singer with legendary guitarist (that’s him on Bowie’s ‘Heroes’) who’ve amassed 120 million YouTube views for their ‘Sunday Lunch’ sessions.

name: TRAMPOLENE
bio: Teenage angst and the tribulations of growing up by the band fronted by Welsh punk poet Jack Jones.

name: TRAUMER
bio: Traumer is a French DJ and producer recognized for his contributions to the techno and house music scenes. His sub-genre often leans towards deep tech and minimal house, characterized by hypnotic rhythms and meticulous production.

name: TURNO
bio: Turno is a prominent figure in the drum and bass scene, known for his high-energy tracks, aggressive basslines, and dynamic DJ sets that captivate audiences worldwide.

name: TWIN SUN
bio: Twin Sun is a duo that produces and DJs in the disco house genre. Their music typically features upbeat, funky basslines and retro-sounding synths, which bring a modern twist to the classic disco sound.

name: TWO DOOR CINEMA CLUB
bio: Post punk indie synth pop with a high melodic quota brimming with sunny-side platitudes and peppy tempos.

name: UNAI TROTTI
bio: The master of brilliant transitions, pulsating tech groovers, proggy house and other 90s oriented goodness.

name: UNCLE DUGS
bio: Uncle Dugs is a DJ and radio presenter known for his dedication to Jungle and Drum and Bass music. He curates shows that highlight classic tracks while introducing new talent in the genre.

name: UNGLUED
bio: Unglued is an artist in the drum and bass sub-genre. Known for high energy tracks and intricate breakbeats, Unglued has made a significant impact on the DnB scene.

name: USHTI BABA
bio: Ushti Baba is a folk fusion band known for their energetic performances that combine traditional folk instrumentation with contemporary rhythms and melodies. They are celebrated for their eclectic sound and dynamic live shows.

name: VILLAGE CUTS
bio: Village Cuts is a music duo known for their fusion of Afrobeat, electronic, and dancehall music, producing vibrant and energetic tracks.

name: VIOLETA VICCI
bio: Rooted in natural soundscapes and highlighting the fragility of the environment, singer and violinist Violeta Vicci is a multi-faceted contemporary classical and electronic artist.

name: VOICE OF BACEPROT
bio: Indonesian Muslim metalheads with headscarves and heavy, heavy guitars dropping into some exotic melodies.

name: WES BAGGALEY
bio: Wes Baggaley is a UK-based DJ known for his eclectic mix of house and techno. With a deep love for electronic music, his sets often span various sub-genres, blending classic house sounds with the edgier side of techno.

name: WILFY D
bio: Hailing from Bristol, Wilfy D has been making waves with his distinctive sound blending House, UK Garage and R&B. Wilfy D continues to leave his mark on the UK scene, seamlessly blending the past with the present.

name: WILKINSON
bio: One of the UK’s best known electronic artists whose ‘Cognition’ album became the most successful drum and bass album for a decade.

name: WILL VARLEY
bio: Singer songwriter marrying vivid imagery, raw emotion and surrealism to capture his personal musings.

name: WILLIE J HEALEY
bio: Willie J Healey is a British singer-songwriter known for his eclectic blend of indie rock and alternative sounds. His music often features catchy melodies, introspective lyrics, and a laid-back, yet energetic vibe.

name: WODDA
bio: With a 'no stone left unturned' attitude when producing and hunting for music, Wodda has crafted himself a foundation of versatility.

name: Y U QT
bio: UK-centric rave, jungle, garage, house and bassline.

name: YARD ACT
bio: Moving effortlessly between a world of hypnotic electronic dance grooves, upbeat vibes and their trademark obtuse post punk narrative in gloriously schizophrenic style.

name: YEMZ
bio: The DJ for the girls and the gang. Whether its waistline warpers, baile krud & anything in between, Yemz has been dizzying dance floors and festivals with a spiral of genres doused in steeze & she’s just getting started with her debut production already setting flames with much more in the pipeline

name: YOUNG MARCO
bio: Young Marco is a Dutch DJ and producer known for his eclectic approach to electronic music, blending elements of house, disco, and ambient. His sets are celebrated for their unpredictability and emotional depth.

name: YOUTH
bio: Grammy award winning producer, founding member and bassist of the rock band Killing Joke.

name: YUNG SINGH
bio: Yung Singh is a UK-based DJ making waves in the house and UK garage scenes. He is known for his unique ability to blend old-school rhythmic vibes with contemporary electronic sounds.

name: YUSHH
bio: Deep and dubby atmospheric electronic sounds.

name: ZED BIAS
bio: Zed Bias is a pioneering figure in the UK Garage and 2-step garage scenes. Known for his innovative productions, he played a crucial role in shaping the sound of early 2000s UK dance music.

name: ZERO 7
bio: Zero 7 is a British musical duo known for their contributions to the downtempo and chillout genres. Their music often features a blend of electronic and acoustic elements, with lush, ambient soundscapes and soulful vocal performances. They gained popularity in the early 2000s with albums like 'Simple Things' and 'When It Falls'.

name: ZERO 7 DJ
bio: Presenting their Swim Surreal DJ set.

name: ZIMMA
bio: Zimma is associated with the UK bass music scene, producing tracks that blend elements of house, garage, and bassline.

name: ZOE WREN
bio: Zoe Wren is a folk musician from the UK, known for her storytelling through music. Her style often incorporates traditional folk elements with modern acoustic sounds, creating a unique blend that resonates with contemporary audiences while preserving the essence of folk music.
